ModMetadata.Name: LibConstruct
ModMetadata.Author: tom_is_unlucky
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]LibConstruct[/h1] This is a library for custom placement in Stationeers. It does nothing on its own but provides functionality to other mods.
Currently this provides the board surface placement and base piece connections in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3505169479]Modular Consoles[/url].
[url=https://github.com/tsholmes/StationeersLibConstruct]Source on Github[/url] This requires BepInEx and [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad]StationeersLaunchPad[/url] v0.2.x
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 0.2.6[/h3] [list] [*]Skip OnRegisteredBoard hook on network clients that was causing boards to be created twice. [/list]
